[[File:Adult teeth.png|neant|thumbnail]]

question.question: What is the primary purpose of the international dental numbering system?
question.option_a: To identify the sequence in which teeth erupt in children
question.option_b: To standardize the naming of dental procedures across different countries
question.option_c: To track the growth and development of teeth in adolescents
question.option_d: To provide a universal system for identifying and recording the location of teeth
